scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n BACKEND,FRONTEND,ELECTRON -c green,cyan,magenta "cross-env PYTHONUNBUFFERED=1" "cd frontend && npm run dev" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 && cross-env NODE_ENV=development electron ."
scripts.dev:all: concurrently -k "npm:dev:backend" "cd frontend && npm run dev" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 && cross-env NODE_ENV=development electron ."
